name: emo_sadness_mean
description: Average intensity of sadness expressed by the customer throughout the call (scaled 0–1).

name: emo_sadness_median
description: Median sadness intensity across customer utterances (scaled 0–1).

name: emo_sadness_var
description: Variance in sadness intensity across the call.

name: emo_sadness_max
description: Maximum sadness intensity reached during the call (scaled 0–1).

name: emo_approval_mean
description: Average approval or agreement expressed by the customer (scaled 0–1).

name: emo_approval_median
description: Median approval intensity during the call (scaled 0–1).

name: emo_approval_var
description: Variability in approval intensity expressed across the call.

name: emo_approval_max
description: Maximum approval intensity detected during the call (scaled 0–1).

name: emo_anger_mean
description: Average intensity of anger expressed by the customer (scaled 0–1).

name: emo_anger_median
description: Median anger intensity across customer utterances (scaled 0–1).

name: emo_anger_var
description: Variance in anger intensity throughout the conversation.

name: emo_anger_max
description: Maximum anger intensity reached at any point in the call (scaled 0–1).

name: emo_annoyance_mean
description: Average annoyance intensity expressed by the customer (scaled 0–1).

name: emo_annoyance_median
description: Median annoyance intensity across customer utterances (scaled 0–1).

name: emo_annoyance_var
description: Variance in annoyance intensity over the call.

name: emo_annoyance_max
description: Maximum annoyance level expressed by the customer (scaled 0–1).

name: emo_confusion_mean
description: Average confusion expressed by the customer throughout the call (scaled 0–1).

name: emo_confusion_median
description: Median confusion level in the conversation (scaled 0–1).

name: emo_confusion_var
description: Variance in confusion intensity across the call.

name: emo_confusion_max
description: Maximum confusion intensity recorded (scaled 0–1).

name: emo_gratitude_mean
description: Average gratitude expressed by the customer during the call.

name: emo_gratitude_median
description: Median gratitude intensity across utterances (scaled 0–1).

name: emo_gratitude_var
description: Variance in gratitude intensity shown during the call.

name: emo_gratitude_max
description: Maximum gratitude intensity observed during the call.

name: num_agent_turns
description: How many times the agent spoke during the call.

name: num_customer_turns
description: How many times the customer spoke during the call.

name: total_words_agent
description: Total number of words spoken by the agent in the conversation.

name: total_words_customer
description: Total number of words spoken by the customer in the conversation.

name: avg_agent_utt_len
description: Average number of words in each agent utterance.

name: avg_customer_utt_len
description: Average number of words in each customer utterance.

name: disfluency_count
description: Number of speech disfluencies (um, uh, hesitations, repeated words).

name: question_count
description: Total number of questions asked during the call.

name: sentiment_start
description: Sentiment score at the beginning of the call (negative to positive).

name: sentiment_end
description: Sentiment score at the end of the call.

name: sentiment_change
description: Change in sentiment from start to end (end − start).
